mapper.select: SELECT i.itemNum, i.ctNum, itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice, discount, mainImage FROM item i JOIN ( SELECT ctNum FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT ctNum = 1 START WITH parentCT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ctNum = parentCT ) c ON c.ctNum = i.ctNum WHERE regDate >= SYSDATE - 7 ORDER BY regDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item i JOIN ( SELECT ctNum FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT ctNum = 1 START WITH parentCT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ctNum = parentCT ) c ON c.ctNum = i.ctNum WHERE regDate >= SYSDATE - 7 ORDER BY regDate DESC
